snippet.title: The Butterfly's Dream - iOS Game Trailer
snippet.description:
The Butterfly's Dream is a relaxing adventure mobile game with creative puzzles and beautiful landscapes. We hope to bring you an immersive experience with a taste of traditional East Asian visual arts, music, and culture.

The Butterfly's Dream will be released on Dec. 4th 2018. Please pre-order at https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1438069957. We hope to see you soon!

To know more about us, please visit https://plumpbunstudio.com/
